attributes.action: convince Nestlé to bring back the discontinued "citrus polos"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The citrus flavoured polo mints were possibly the best variety of the popular mints, and there has been much discussion of them since their discontinuation. The cease in production of citrus flavoured polos has provoked controversy and heated debate, and this clearly shows that they were incredibly popular among the British public, and there has even been a facebook petition created to bring back these popular sweets

NB: THIS IS IN NO WAY INTENDING TO BE HUMOROUS! THIS IS A SERIOUS MATTER CONCERNING THE DEMANDS OF REAL PEOPLE!
And also I have no power to tell the people at Nestlé what to sell and not sell, but I thought that the government might be so helpful as to try and negotiate something!

rejection.details: This petition has no point about government policy.
reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
